snippet: The series, adapted from the BBC TV drama, stars Kevin Spacey and Robin Wright as a ruthless Washington politician and his wife, and is the centerpiece in Netflix's growing slate of original programming.
abstract: The series, adapted from the BBC TV drama, stars Kevin Spacey and Robin Wright as a ruthless Washington politician and his wife, and is the centerpiece in Netflix's growing slate of original programming.

headline.main: Netflix Sets February Premiere for 'House of Cards'
headline.print_headline: Netflix Sets the Premiere Of ‘House of Cards’
